description: Clip in human hair extensions are the most popular hair extensions, you can use add highlights, make your hair thickness or simply make your hair longer. And it's available in supper wide range of colors and lengths. These clip in hair extensions made of 100% human hair, can be instantly applied to parted areas of the head and is completely invisible to make an all natural appearance, just like the hair is growing from your own scalp. 7 pieces total 70 grams per set, Contents: 1 pieces x 8 inch Wide With 4 Clips Attached,2 pieces x 6 inch Wide With 3 Clips Attached,2 pieces x 4 inch Wide With 2 Clips Attached,2 pieces x 2 inch Wide With 1 Clips Attached.
